*div1 type="summary"* *p*Joseph D. Grafton to Austin, St. Genevieve, Mo., May 5, 1830. Inquiring conditions of settlement in Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*St. Genevieve, Mri,*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-05-1830">May 55 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir, */p* *p*At the request of my *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*(*person_mentioned*late Mrs. Henry Elliot*/person_mentioned*t) I take the liberty of addressing you.—*/p*
*p*As the bearer leaves this in a few minutes, I have only time to ask a few questions, and will be thankful for your reply at an early day.—*/p*
*p*1. My *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*consists of myself, *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*and 7 *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*, four of whom are of the *person_mentioned*late Henry Elliott*/person_mentioned*.— What encouragement for such a *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*to join your *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned*?*/p*
*p*2. What encouragement for persons half way *person_mentioned*professional*/person_mentioned*, I being successor to the*person_mentioned* late Thos. Oliver*/person_mentioned*, as *person_mentioned*Clerk of the Courts*/person_mentioned*, here ?—*/p*
*p*3. Is it necessary, in your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, to profess the Catholic faith ?*/p*
*p*4. My *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*requests me to ask whether you would make to *person_mentioned*Henry Elliotts' only son (Charles)*/person_mentioned* any donation of *location_mentioned*lands*/location_mentioned*, on account of *person_mentioned*H. Elliott*/person_mentioned*'s trip to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1822">1822*/date_mentioned*—?*/p*
*p*5. Whether a *person_mentioned*business man*/person_mentioned*, but without much capital, could probably acquire a good living in connexion with*person_mentioned* Capt. Henry Austin*/person_mentioned*s Steam boat line ?*/p*
*p*As business in the *location_mentioned*Courts */location_mentioned*is getting very small in this *location_mentioned*County*/location_mentioned*, I have an idea of removing to some other place, but with so large a *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, I would not like to do it without a reasonable certainty of belter things elsewhere.—your early reply will greatly oblige me.-— *person_mentioned*Mrs. Grafton*/person_mentioned* unites with me in the expression of sentiments of true respect.—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jos. D. Grafton*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esq*/person_mentioned*. *location_mentioned*San Fellipe De Austin Texas*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr. Beard*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
